API Documentation

  • Foo
    • a
    • b
built with pdoc

with_pydantic

A small example with Pydantic entities.

 1"""
 2A small example with Pydantic entities.
 3"""
 4
 5import pydantic
 6
 7
 8class Foo(pydantic.BaseModel):
 9    """Foo class documentation."""
10
11    model_config = pydantic.ConfigDict(
12        use_attribute_docstrings=True,
13    )
14
15    a: int = pydantic.Field(default=1, description="Docstring for a")
16
17    b: int = 2
18    """Docstring for b."""
class Foo(pydantic.main.BaseModel): 
 9class Foo(pydantic.BaseModel):
10    """Foo class documentation."""
11
12    model_config = pydantic.ConfigDict(
13        use_attribute_docstrings=True,
14    )
15
16    a: int = pydantic.Field(default=1, description="Docstring for a")
17
18    b: int = 2
19    """Docstring for b."""

Foo class documentation.

a: int = 1

Docstring for a

b: int = 2

Docstring for b.
